WorkItem.ClosedComment: made a commit to turn it off
WorkItem.Description:
In Arms mode there are a bunch of trinkets with negitive DPS, they don't have directly offensive stats, but they still should not be decreasing DPS, example: http://www.wowhead.com/?item=47290 is being shown to have -8.47 DPS
Â 
~Droid.

Comments.Message: It's because the trinket has a use effect that is not dps related

How is that decreasing DPS though? In the example I linked getting 4610 HP for 15 seconds shouldn't decrease the DPS you are doing. Or is it pulling a GCD for the trinket? I am pretty sure that trinkets don't trigger the GCD.

~Droid
the effect isn't decreasing your dps, the trinket is absorbing a cooldown.
We know that some don't but I don't have verification that *none* do. It has been my experience that a GCD does occur when using trinkets.

Can you name one trinket that does?  I certainly can't.  Every trinket I've ever owned has NOT triggered the GCD, at least as far as I can remember.

A quick google of "wow trinket use gcd" returns only results that say they do NOT use the GCD.
